Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type or mutant LRRK2 were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of LRRK2 at S1292 in p.G2019S mutant compared to wild-type.
Enhanced kinase activity in p.R1441C mutant compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells used as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels within 15% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels exceeding 30% of wild-type controls.

Material used.Description: Transgenic mice overexpressing LRRK2 mutants were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased interaction with Î±-synuclein in p.G2019S mutant mice.
Enhanced recruitment of ubiquitin ligases in p.R1441C mutant mice.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic littermates used as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction levels within 20% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction levels exceeding 40% of wild-type controls.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2 mutants were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of substrates in p.G2019S mutant compared to wild-type.
Enhanced kinase activity in p.R1401C mutant compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells used as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 25% of wild-type controls.
